entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 02:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -17.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -23.9°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
